mapper.select: select reply_id As replyId , board_id As boardId , replyContent , replyer , register_date As registerDate , update_date As updateDate from tbl_reply where board_id = #{boardId} order by reply_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(board_id, replyContent, replyer) values(#{boardId}, #{replyContent}, #{replyer})
